titleStmt.title: SII 14.81: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 81. (A.R. No. 87 of 1907.) AMBĀSAMUDRAM, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE BASE OF A RUINED SHRINE IN THE TIRUMŪLANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record dated in the 4th year opposite to the 4th year of the king, records the gift of land in Kīḻūr-kuṇḍukaḻam by a tiṇaikkaḷattāṉ of Nālkūr in Veṇbu-nāḍu, for providing for the expenses of feeding some brāhmaṇas, who chanted some portions of the Vēdas in the presence of god Tiruchchālaittuṟai-niṉṟaruḷiṉa-Emberumāṉ of Iḷaṅgōykkuḍi, a brahmadēya of Muḷḷi-nāḍu. A shrine or hall called Śrīkaraṇatiruchchittirakūtam is also referred to in this record. The astronomical details of the day, namely, Dhanus month and Svāti-nakshatra are of no use in determining the date of the record.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . coḻaṉṟalaikoṇṭa kovirapāṇṭiyaṟku yāṇṭu nālu I
taṉetir nālu . Ivvāṇṭu muḷḷināṭṭup piṟammateyam Iḷaṅ
koykkuṭit tiruccālaittuṟai niṉṟaruḷiṉa Emperumāṉukku śrī
karaṇa tiruccittirakūṭattiruntu muppattiraṇṭu Āc
caium Aiñcuvāramu moti tāṉam pukkār taṉunāiṟṟu co
ti nāḷ melaikkaṭṭuṇpatāka veṇpuṇāṭṭu nālkūrt tiṇaikkaḷattāṉ
cāttaṉ vilaikoṇṭu cavaiyāriṟai kāṭṭātitāka vaitta pūmi kiḻurk ku
ṇṭu kaḷam cantirātittaval niṟka nīroṭu Aṭṭik kuṭuttatu .
Digital edition of SII 14.81 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
